wikipedia_page.main: John Calder Forman (1884 – 14 April 1975) was a British insurance agent and politician.

response: Taylor was born in Glasgow. After being educated at the High School of Glasgow and the University of Glasgow, where he attended with future Labour leader John Smith, he worked as a journalist on the Glasgow Herald and was a Glasgow City Councillor from 1960. He fought Glasgow Springburn at the 1959 general election, but he was beaten by Labour's John Forman.
